page.title: Documentation for the MOEA Framework
page.description: Documentation for the MOEA Framework, including the API javadoc

content.p: This page provides links to all available documentation for the MOEA Framework. If you are encountering problems or have questions not covered in the documentation, please submit a bug report through the support page.

li.span: The API specification details all classes, constructors and methods provided by the MOEA Framework library. The API specification is also provided in the compiled binaries distribution inside the javadoc folder.
A comprehensive user manual for the MOEA Framework. This manual walks through various uses of the MOEA Framework in detail, providing step-by-step instructions and troubleshooting advice.

img.alt: View the code quality metrics for the latest release

li.span: Learn how the developers maintain the correctness, reliability and overall quality of the MOEA Framework. This report also contains detailed code metrics for the latest release.
